p: Colony fragments were kept in the laboratory at 25 ± 3 °C with a mean hygrometry at 47%, and maintained in their original nesting substrate in boxes of 370 × 255 × H160 mm 3. Colonies were supplied with a water-honey dilution (50%), proteinate food (insects such as mealworms, fruit flies or crickets) and water ad libitum. The interaction experiment was conducted in the two months after the installation and acclimation of the colonies.
